item.title: Supreme Court rejects fast track of Trump tariff challenge by toy companies
item.description: Legal challenges to President Donald Trump’s April 2 tariffs have introduced uncertainty around a central piece of his trade agenda.

item.title: Europe and Iran holding talks as Trump sets two-week deadline for U.S. strikes decision
item.description: European officials are hoping for a last-minute diplomatic breakthrough with Tehran to deter further escalations of the Middle East conflict.

item.title: Israeli president denies pursuing regime change in Iran — goal is to 'remove' nuclear program
item.description: Herzog accused Teheran of "cheating," saying that the country was "rushing to the bomb."
